misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm.
description: The code uses AES/CBC/PKCS5PADDING algorithm which is considered risky and should be replaced with more secure algorithms like AES/GCM/NoPadding or ChaCha20Poly1305.
recommendation: Replace AES/CBC/PKCS5PADDING with AES/GCM/NoPadding or ChaCha20Poly1305 algorithm.
